content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the kaunas district court the case involved a dissolution of marriage and the division of assets between two parties the defendant had to pay a stamp duty and court fees the immovable property including buildings and land plots will be divided equally between the parties the movable property specifically a car will be awarded to the defendant who will also have to pay the applicant a monetary compensation for their greater share of the property acquired during the marriage the court dismissed the action and ordered the defendant to pay a portion of the costs to the state budget the applicant was granted statefunded legal aid

metadata.cost: 265.00 EUR (stamp duty) + 1'328.00 EUR (court fees) to be borne by the defendant
